name: Bombs Away (nhahn)
description:
Made for Low Effort Jam 17 in ~3 hours.

One person against a world that wants to bomb your island. Stop them using your giant fan to blow the bombs away!

The game has a scaling difficulty system. Every time you win you can play again at a harder difficulty. At harder difficulties, planes spawn faster and drop more bombs.

Post the highest difficulty you reached in the comments! Once I get to difficulty 8-9 I get stuck.

Controls: A and D moves left and right, Left Arrow and Right Arrow rotates your fan.

Tools

  • Game Engine: Unity 2020.3.16
  • Music: 1BitDragon
  • Art: FireAlpaca

Full game code available at my Low Effort Jam Repo: https://github.com/heyacfox/LEGJ-Submissions

Game inspired by:
